meanings.definition: A roofing tile with an S-shaped profile.
meanings.sent1: The old house had a roof made of pantiles.
meanings.sent2: The pantile was carefully placed on top of the roof.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used a pantile as a sled down the roof.
meanings.sent4: The pantile danced in the wind, creating a rhythmic pattern on the roof.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pantile stood out against the gray sky.

meanings.sent1: They decided to pantile the entire roof for a traditional look.
meanings.sent2: The workers will pantile the new building next week.
meanings.sent3: He tried to pantile the ground with leaves for a soft landing.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to pantile the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The music seemed to pantile the air with rhythm and melody.
